products.name: The Mat 5mm Made With FSC-Certified Rubber
products.whyWeMadeThis: This mat features a natural rubber base with a little extra cushion to give your body more depth while your mind goes deep.

featurePanels.title: Materials(Click to Expand)
content: Our innovative grippy top layer absorbs moisture to help you stay grounded in high-sweat practices
A sustainably sourced and FSC™-certified natural rubber base gives you cushioning and textured grip for low-sweat practices
I'm reversible—flip as needed between the smooth, grippy side and the cushioned, natural rubber side
An antimicrobial additive helps prevent mould and mildew on the mat
CONTAINS LATEX: People with rubber or latex allergies should avoid contact with this product as it contains natural rubber and may contain latex

featurePanels.title: Product Features(Click to Expand)
content: Colour may change over time. After use, wipe mat down with a natural cleanser and store out of direct sunlight
Mat will have a slight smell that will fade over time—unroll and let it air out before use

featurePanels.title: Material and care(Click to Expand)
content: Body: 55% Natural rubber, 23% Synthetic rubber, 15% Polyurethane, 5% Polyester, 2% Nylon
Ensure the mat is dry before rolling

black/white Take Form Yoga Mat 5mm
Black Take Form Yoga Mat 5mm

products.name: Take Form Yoga Mat 5mm
products.whyWeMadeThis: Let your senses guide you. The innovative 3D-texture helps you feel your way around the mat and stay centred in poses without looking down.

featurePanels.title: Materials(Click to Expand)
content: Made with natural rubber material that is sustainably sourced and FSC™ (Forest Stewardship Council™) certified to support the protection of forest ecosystems and the people, plants, and animals that inhabit them
CONTAINS LATEX: People with rubber or latex allergies should avoid contact with this product as it contains natural rubber and may contain latex

featurePanels.title: Care Instructions(Click to Expand)
content: To care for the mat, wipe it down after practice with a natural cleanser and store it out of direct sunlight
To increase the longevity of the mat's 3D surface, please roll it with the top side facing out
Use this mat for yoga practice only, please keep weights and shoes off

featurePanels.title: Material and care(Click to Expand)
content: Body: 34% Natural rubber, 27% Thermoplastic elastomer, 14% Synthetic rubber, 12% Polyurethane, 7% Polyester, 6% Cotton
Ensure the mat is dry before rolling
